name: Puzzler Collection
description:
We're putting a whole new twist on your favorite puzzle games! Experience the classic Crosswords, Sudoku, Word Search and Fitword puzzles you love with all-new, interactive video game play. With over 2,000 puzzles and three difficulty levels, Puzzler will wrack your brain as you try to solve them all!

Features

• Over 2,000 puzzles for ultimate variety and replay value.
• Unique game modes include\"Quick Blast\"(the player allots a specific amount of time to play games and beat the clock) and Fast and Fun (complete as many puzzles as possible in a row without running out of time or making an error).
• Play against a friend in Head-to-Head mode-two different multiplayer games keep friends coming back for more.
• Three difficulty levels create fun for players of any skill.
